mapper.select: SELECT id, bucket_name as bucketName, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, bucket_state as bucketState FROM bucket WHERE user_id = #{userId};
SELECT id as userId, nickname, intro FROM user where id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM user WHERE id = #{userId})

SELECT b.id as bucketId, u.id as userId, b.bucket_name as bucketName, b.bucket_state as bucketState, b.end_date as endDate, u.profile_url as userProfileUrl FROM bucket b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id JOIN bookmark bm ON bm.bucket_id = b.id WHERE u.id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM user WHERE id = #{userId})
